data.title: Student Academic Honors – Spring 2024
data.text:
Congratulations to the 3,697 ACC students who earned academic honors during the Spring 2024 semester, including 1,142 on the Dean’s List (3.50 - 3.74 term GPA), 245 on the Vice President’s List (3.75 - 3.99 term GPA), and 2,310 on the President’s List (4.0 term GPA). Students must successfully complete a minimum of 6 credit hours during the semester to be eligible for academic honors.

ACC provides innovative and responsive educational and economic opportunities in an accessible, inclusive environment. ACC offers both in-person and online classes, serving students throughout Arapahoe County, Douglas County and south metro Denver. ACC has 7 academic pathways for students to explore, connect and succeed, as well as guaranteed transfer programs into all 4-year public universities in Colorado.

President's List (4.0 Semester GPA)

Vice President's List (3.75 - 3.99 Semester GPA)
